email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed your counteroffer with the owner. They’re willing to come down to $50.00 per metric ton, but that’s their best offer at the moment. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can accept $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? We’d like to finalize the details as soon as possible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.00 works for you. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else to proceed. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with finalizing the charter party. We’ll send over the signed agreement shortly. Thanks for your help! Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll get the charter party drafted and sent over for your review. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Looking forward to working together. Best regards, Sarah
